item.description:
Bring your chairs, blankets, bug spray, food and wine, a lot of us share our stuff with the others so offer some to your fellow attendees too.

WE WILL BE IN THE GENERAL AREA OF THE ROSE GARDEN bORDER...BUT STILL IN VIEW OF THE PERFORMERS YET BUT BACK ENOUGH SO WE CAN CONVERSE AND MOVE AROUND FREELY..

LOOK FOR THE ORANGE POLE and THE yellow "SLOW OLD kids at PLAY sign

http://www.elizabethp...

Getting There:

Elizabeth Park is located at the corner of Prospect Avenue and Asylum Avenue on the Hartford / West Hartford line.

I-84 West bound to Exit 48 (Asylum Street).

Stay to the Right on Asylum.

Follow for approximately 1.8 miles.

Turn left into the park (1555 Asylum Avenue, West Hartford). 06117

Park where you see it, its not that bad. but you may have to look a bit if you are late..


I-84 East bound to Exit 44 (Prospect Ave)

Straight thru stop sign.

Left at light onto Prospect.

Follow approximately 1.8 miles.

Entrance on Left (915 Prospect, Hartford)

Park where you find a place.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tracker NV Band at Elizabeth Park
